title: Five-spice chicken noodle stir-fry
description: This clever chicken noodle stir-fry recipe uses time-saving products to make midweek cooking quick and easy. Try our five-spice roast pork, too!
ingredients: 1 tbsp Very Lazy Ginger (from supermarkets) or similar, roughly chopped
2 tbsp soy sauce, plus extra to serve
2 nests Blue Dragon Wholewheat Noodles (from Tesco and other supermarkets)
220g pack Tesco Stir-fry Medley, or similar

method.Step 1: Mix the five-spice, honey, ginger and soy sauce in a bowl. Add the chicken and coat it in the marinade.

method.Step 2: Heat 1 tbsp of he oil in a wok over a high heat and fry the chicken for 5 minutes until cooked, sticky and golden. Remove and set aside, then wipe the wok.

method.Step 3: Meanwhile cook the noodles according to the packet instructions. Drain and run under cold water to prevent them sticking, then set aside. Slice the stir-fry veg into matchsticks.

method.Step 4: Add the remaining oil to the wok and stir-fry the veg for 1-2 minutes until beginning to wilt. 5. Return the chicken to the pan with the noodles and fry for 30 seconds with a splash of soy sauce. Divide between two bowls and squeeze over a wedge of lime
